pre_conversation.line: Atreus: I'm sorry, father. I didn't mean to disobey you.
Atreus: I just wanted to help.
Atreus: I thought I could do something to stop the war.
Atreus: I didn't know it would end like this.
Atreus: I'm sorry, I should have listened to you.
Atreus: I was just trying to do the right thing.
Atreus: I didn't know it would end like this.
Atreus: I'm sorry, father. I'll do better.
Atreus: I promise.
Atreus: I'll do whatever you ask of me.
Atreus: I just want to make you proud.
Atreus: I know I've made mistakes.
Atreus: I know I've let you down.
Atreus: I'll do better, I promise.
Atreus: I'll do whatever it takes to make things right.
Atreus: I'll do whatever it takes to make you proud.
